method.name: is_play_space_unbounded
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if play space is set to unbounded reference space.

method.name: is_unbounded_reference_space_available
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if unbounded reference space is available for use.

method.name: set_unbounded_reference_space_enabled
method.description: Sets the unbounded reference space as enabled or disabled. Note: The AndroidXR Unbounded Reference Space project setting must be enabled in order to enable the reference space.
